text: @BuzzFeedNews Disagree your deduction that there are no mutations of virus just by referencing 2 US patients. Wuhan is lacking medical resources and it’s like a hotbed for RNA cocktail as patients popping in and out of hospitals without diagnosis and treatment.. there lives mattered too.!
